name: MISSON TO MARS
description:
I'm an architect and I built this little game on Mars using a very simple Unreal Engine template. Games are my hobby and this is my first time designing a game. It took me nine hours to make it. 

The story is about a shooting competition on Mars. You can choose between Finnish and Korean characters (Korean characters use air guns, Finnish characters use bows and arrows, and they are bound by Livelink to see their rich expressions and communicate with their culture during the game, this part is currently implemented in my level, but I need some time to update these metahumans to the new version) 

A lonely man was lost on Mars when he saw a huge astronaut on Mars, he was confused by the size of this Martian creature. 

Each time he kills a Martian astronaut, he gains more light on the ground to find his way home 

KEY: WASD to move, left mouse button to shoot.

Ximing Zhong

Phd student Aalto ,architecture department
